mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Mary", "It May Be Silly", and "Cross Trail Capers". ROUND DANCES "Belle Mixer", and "Kit Kat R/M". SPECIAL FEATURES "St. Louis! Here We Come!", "Round Dancing is Fun!", "A Square Dancers' Dream Come True", and "Does Square Dancing Need New Vitality?". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "The Square Dance Picture", "Style Series: Language of Square Dancing #2", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Paging the Round Dancers (Roger Knapps)", "Square of the Month (Frank Sellinger)", "'Round the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
